title: Cap, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in knots, back stitch and underside quilting on plain weave foundation
description: Cap made of three pieces of fabric seamed together. Quilting done before the cap was sewn up. Cap was originally finished with lace.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in knots, back stitch and underside quilting on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-474.
